channel.title: Help with interface

item.title: Help with interface
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

public void info() {
sendQuest("@gre@TweezyScapes Help/Info menu!", 8144);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“Welcome to TweezyScape;Beta”, 8147);
sendQuest(“Want some quick dosh?”, 8148);
sendQuest(“use this command ::train”, 8149);
sendQuest(“And kill the goblins - quick 100k.”, 8150);
sendQuest("-----------------------------------------------------", 8151);
sendQuest(“Need to visit the forums? Then follow this link”, 8152);
sendQuest(“tweezyscape.freeforums.org”, 8153);
sendQuest("------------------------------------------------", 8154);
sendQuest(“RULES”, 8155);
sendQuest("No Hacking! ", 8156);
sendQuest(“No Spamming.”, 8157);
sendQuest(“listen to orders being given by a member of staff”, 8158);
sendQuest(“And obide by rules being given by them”, 8159);
sendQuest(“Abusing mod/admin? Use ::report”, 8160);
sendQuest(“Most of all, Enjoy TweezyScape;Beta”, 8161);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}

As the void at top of client?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 14, 2009, 06:59:51 am[/size][hr]client.java:4059: illegal start of expression if(command.equals("info") && playerRights >= 0)) { ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

now what?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 14, 2009, 07:01:08 am[/size][hr]nvm fixed

Read full topic

item.title: Help with interface
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Replace everything you just showed us with:

public void raresHelp() { sendQuest("@gre@TweezyScapes Help/Info menu!", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Welcome to TweezyScape;Beta", 8147); sendQuest("Want some quick dosh?", 8148); sendQuest("use this command ::train", 8149); sendQuest("And kill the goblins - quick 100k.", 8150); sendQuest("-----------------------------------------------------", 8151); sendQuest("Need to visit the forums? Then follow this link", 8152); sendQuest("tweezyscape.freeforums.org", 8153); sendQuest("------------------------------------------------", 8154); sendQuest("RULES", 8155); sendQuest("No Hacking! ", 8156); sendQuest("No Spamming.", 8157); sendQuest("listen to orders being given by a member of staff", 8158); sendQuest("And obide by rules being given by them", 8159); sendQuest("Abusing mod/admin? Use ::report <name>, <why>", 8160); sendQuest("Most of all, Enjoy TweezyScape;Beta", 8161); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } if(command.equals("info") && playerRights >= 0)) { raresHelp(); }
I think that should work…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with interface
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Yo, im using this command at as interface

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(info") && playerRights >= 0)
{

public void raresHelp() {
sendQuest("@gre@TweezyScapes Help/Info menu!", 8144);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“Welcome to TweezyScape;Beta”, 8147);
sendQuest(“Want some quick dosh?”, 8148);
sendQuest(“use this command ::train”, 8149);
sendQuest(“And kill the goblins - quick 100k.”, 8150);
sendQuest("-----------------------------------------------------", 8151);
sendQuest(“Need to visit the forums? Then follow this link”, 8152);
sendQuest(“tweezyscape.freeforums.org”, 8153);
sendQuest("------------------------------------------------", 8154);
sendQuest(“RULES”, 8155);
sendQuest("No Hacking! ", 8156);
sendQuest(“No Spamming.”, 8157);
sendQuest(“listen to orders being given by a member of staff”, 8158);
sendQuest(“And obide by rules being given by them”, 8159);
sendQuest("Abusing mod/admin? Use ::report “name” ", 8160);
sendQuest(“Most of all, Enjoy TweezyScape;Beta”, 8161);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}[/code]

But i get these errors

[code]client.java:4040: illegal start of expression
public void raresHelp() {
^
client.java:4040: illegal start of expression
public void raresHelp() {
^
client.java:4040: ‘;’ expected
public void raresHelp() {
^
client.java:4056: ‘)’ expected
sendQuest("Abusing mod/admin? Use ::report “name” ", 8160);

                                                        ^

client.java:4056: not a statement
sendQuest("Abusing mod/admin? Use ::report “name” ", 8160);

                                                            ^

client.java:4056: ‘;’ expected
sendQuest("Abusing mod/admin? Use ::report “name” ", 8160);

                                                                    ^

6 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Read full topic
